author: jbellis
msg: send extra gossip to random seed as long as there are less nodes alive than seed nodes configured
patch by Jaakko Laine; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-150

author: davisp
msg: Refactored the fix for active_dbs timeouts.

I was getting a bit of weirdness with the old test version so I updated to be more straight forward in its testing. I've also updated the patch to couch_db_updater.erl to only to the db_updated call when a delayed commit changes the db because it was interacting badly with compaction.

author: pquerna
msg: TS-2: only redefine errnos if they are not set.
